comment: Smart Data models - Machine dataModel schema, adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ManufacturingMachine/master/ManufacturingMachine/schema.json

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: assetIdentifier
contents.comment: An asset identifier (e.g. asset tag number) assigned by the owner.

contents.name: batteryLevel
contents.comment: Battery level. It must be equal to: 1.0 When the battery charge is full. 0.0 When the battery charge empty. Null when it cannot be determined.

contents.name: countryOfManufacture
contents.comment: The country where this machine was manufactured.

contents.name: current
contents.comment: The nominal required supply current (at the nominal supply voltage), in amps

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: factory
contents.comment: The factory name/code manufacturing this machine.

contents.name: firmwareVersion
contents.comment: The (manufacturer specific) firmware version of this machine.

contents.name: firstUsedAt
contents.comment: Indicates the date/time at which date and time the machine was first used (nominally in UTC).

contents.name: hardwareVersion
contents.comment: The (manufacturer specific) hardware version of this machine.

contents.name: installedAt
contents.comment: Indicates the date/time at which date and time the machine was installed (nominally in UTC).

contents.name: manufacturedAt
contents.comment: Indicates the date/time at which date and time the machine was manufactured (nominally in UTC).

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: online
contents.comment: The communication status of this machine. A logical representation of Offline (false) or Online (true).

contents.name: osVersion
contents.comment: The (manufacturer specific) operating system version of this machine

contents.name: power
contents.comment: The nominal rated power consumption of the machine in kW

contents.name: rotationalSpeed
contents.comment: The maximum rotational speed in rpm (for machines such as drills, lathes)

contents.name: serialNumber
contents.comment: The serial number assigned by the manufacturer.

contents.name: softwareVersion
contents.comment: The (manufacturer specific) software version of this machine.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: status
contents.comment: Text formatted (current) machine status code or description. Expected to be the manufacturer or machine specific status code generated by the machine.

contents.name: supplierName
contents.comment: The name of the supplier of this machine.

contents.name: voltage
contents.comment: The nominal required supply voltage, in volts

contents.name: machineOwner
contents.comment: Reference to the owner or owners of the machine as either a Schema.org person or organization.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: subscriptionService
contents.comment: Reference to service subscriptions related to this machine e.g. energy supplies, Internet Service Providers etc, maintenance

contents.name: supportedProtocol
contents.comment: Supported protocol(s) or networks.

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address

contents.name: installationNotes
contents.comment: Notes relating to this machine installation.
